}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== USB dongle with antenna + cradle with cable
The USB ID for this device (or at least, *some* of these devices) is 7392:a812. Two similar USB IDs may be used for closely related products and there would seem to be intermixing. * 7392:a811 ** [https://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2228244 7811UTC mention] * 7392:a812 ** [[User:M86|M86]] has a [[Edimax EW-7811UTC|7811UTC]] (multiple), '''7811UAC''' w/ this USB ID * 7392:a813 ** [https://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2259890 7811UAC mention]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
